page.title: 02RECREATION,eating in Bury.
page.content: Recreation,Wining,Dining,Drinking. The{White Lion}is a popular Public House on Bury Road.It operates normal licensing hours.In the pub there is a restaurant where they sell meals and bar snacks.There is a beer garden.It is patronised by local people and Americans from the Air Force Base in Upwood.The pool,darts and dominoes attract some of the younger generation.They are at their busiest at the weekend.The{Bow Window}is a listed building built in 1460 this makes it medieval.Opening days are Wednesday to Saturday from 7.30 till late ,but it can be hired for private functions.The menu changes every 2 months.There are 13 staff,3 full time and 10 part time.As well as local people many foreigners visit the Restaurant.The lives on the premises,and likes the area very much.
